Name: Chas
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A wonderfully tangy cocktail with great bourbon personality and hints of almond and orange.
History: Created in 2003 by Murray Stenson at Zig Zag Café, Seattle, USA. Murry's original recipe packed some 100ml of 40% liquor, so, in the pursuit of sobriety, I've halved the measure of each ingredient from the original and switched the glass from a Martini to a Nick & Nora.
